title: Develop a Manufacturing Process
description: A manufacturing engineer needs to develop the step-by-step process for assembling a new component.

tasks.description: Analyze the component's engineering drawings to break down the assembly into a logical sequence of steps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a high-level process flow.

tasks.description: Write detailed work instructions for each step, including the required tools, parts, and quality checks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent authors a complete and clear set of work instructions.

tasks.description: Create a visual aid, such as a 3D animated instruction set, to help technicians on the shop floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a helpful visual guide for the assembly process.
